description: This header file defines functions for creating message objects related to light events (addition, removal, update) in a smart lighting system. It provides declarations for functions to generate messages informing a server about changes to lights, such as addition, deletion, or updates.

methods.name: createLightAddedMessage
methods.description: Creates a message to inform the server that a new light has been added to the system.

methods.name: createLightRemovedMessage
methods.description: Creates a message to inform the server that a light has been removed from the system.

methods.name: createLightUpdatedMessage
methods.description: Creates a message to inform the server that a light has been updated.
